channel.title: General Marriage Hiromi Japan Tokyo on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Marriage Hiromi Japan Tokyo on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: whew.. almost all done..
item.description: So everything worked out and Hiromi and I were married on tuesday. It was really fun. and really barely more than signing a paper. which i liked quite a bit. Today we did the first part of the visa stuff. It was insane. and really crazy. totally stressful. government offices are annoying and really bureaucratic. i felt like i was in a terry gilliam movie. hah. But we are almost done - and the next part doesn’t seem to be too much different than this part - just a bit more “official.
